## get-to-know-the-data plots


```{r}
library(ggpubr)
theme_set(theme_pubr())
```


### Frequency plots

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(data = browse_9, aes(beitetrykk)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 70)+
  theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_9_dist, aes(beitetrykkr)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 70)+
  theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_9_distsub, aes(beitetrykkr)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 70)+
  theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_9, aes(distvei1)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 70)+
  theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_9, aes(disthus)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 70)+
  theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_9, aes(log(disthus+1))) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 70)+
  theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_9, aes(disthus^2)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 70)+
  theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_9_dist, aes(disthus_cut200)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 70)+
  theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_9_distbin, aes(disthus)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 70)+
  theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_9, aes(distvei1)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 70)+
  theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_9_dist, aes(distvei1)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 70)+
  theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_9_distbin, aes(distvei1)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 70)+
  theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_9, aes(helling)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 70)+
  theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_9, aes(HOH)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 70)+
  theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_9, aes(log(tretetthet))) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 70)+
  theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_9_dist, aes(KOMNR, beitetrykkr)) +
  geom_boxplot()+
  theme_classic()

```





### Effect of distance to roads on browsing pressure %
#### ROS
```{r}

ggplot(data = browse_sub, aes(browsingpressure)) +
  stat_smooth(method = "lm", formula(y ~ x + I(x^2)))
  theme_classic()
 


# browsingpressure = (akkumulert i 9., siste Ã¥r i 10.)
ggplot(data = browse9, aes(distroad1, browsingpressure, fill = distroad1)) +
            geom_point()
            labs(x = "Distance to closest public road (m)", y = "Browsing pressure %")+
            theme_classic()

ggplot(browse9, aes(x = distvei1, y = beitetrykk)) +
            geom_point()+
    stat_smooth(method = "lm", color = "red") +
  stat_smooth(color = "blue") + 
  labs(x = "Distance to closest public road in m (where closest house further than 500 m away)", y = "Browsing pressure %")

ggplot(broadhouse10, aes(x = distroad1, y = browsingpressure)) +
            geom_point()+
    stat_smooth(method = "lm", color = "red") +
  stat_smooth(color = "blue") + 
  labs(x = "Distance to closest public road in m (where closest house futher than 500 m away)", y = "Browsing pressure %")
            
ggplot(broadhouse9, aes(x = distroad1, y = browsingpressure)) +
            geom_point()+
    stat_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ x + I(x^2), color = "red") +
  stat_smooth(color = "blue")+ 
  labs(x = "Distance to closest public road in m (where closest house futher than 500 m away)", y = "Browsing pressure %")

ggplot(broadhouse9, aes(x = distroad1, y = browsingpressure)) +
            geom_point()+
    stat_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ x + I(x^2) + I(x^3), color = "yellow") +
  stat_smooth(color = "blue")+ 
  labs(x = "Distance to closest public road in m (where closest house futher than 500 m away)", y = "Browsing pressure %")
    
ggplot(broadhouse9, aes(x = distroad1, y = log(browsingpressure + 1))) +
            geom_point()+
    stat_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ x + I(x^2) + I(x^3), color = "yellow") +
  stat_smooth(color = "blue")+ 
  labs(x = "Distance to closest public road in m (where closest house futher than 500 m away)", y = "Browsing pressure %")


ggplot(browseroad1500, aes(x = distroad1, y = browsingpressure)) +
            geom_point()+
    stat_smooth(method = "lm", color = "red") +
  stat_smooth(color = "blue")
            
ggplot(browseroad1500, aes(x = distroad1, y = browsingpressure)) +
            geom_point()+
    stat_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ x + I(x^2), color = "red") +
  stat_smooth(color = "blue")

ggplot(browseroad1500, aes(x = distroad1, y = browsingpressure)) +
            geom_point()+
    stat_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ x + I(x^2) + I(x^3), color = "yellow") +
  stat_smooth(color = "blue")
    
ggplot(browseroad1500, aes(x = distroad1, y = log(browsingpressure + 1))) +
            geom_point()+
    stat_smooth(method = "lm", formula = y ~ x + I(x^2) + I(x^3), color = "yellow") +
  stat_smooth(color = "blue")


ggplot(broadhouse9, aes(x = distroad1, y = browsingpressure)) +
    geom_point() +
    stat_smooth(method = "glm", color = "green") +
  stat_smooth(color = "blue") + 
  labs(x = "Distance to closest public road in m (where closest house futher than 500 m away)", y = "Browsing pressure %")

ggplot(browse_9, aes(x = distvei1, y = elgbROSprs9)) +
    geom_point() +
    stat_smooth(method = "glm", formula = y ~ x + I(x^2), color = "red") +
  stat_smooth(color = "blue") + 
  labs(x = "Distance to closest public road in m (where closest house futher than 500 m away)", y = "Browsing pressure %")

ggplot(browse_9, aes(x = distvei1, y = beitetrykk)) +
    geom_point() +
    stat_smooth(method = "glm", formula = y ~ x + I(x^2), color = "red") +
  stat_smooth(color = "blue") + 
  labs(x = "Distance to closest public road in m (where closest house futher than 500 m away)", y = "Browsing pressure %")

ggplot(broadhouse9, aes(x = distroad1, y = browsingpressure)) +
    geom_point() +
    stat_smooth(method = "glm", formula = y ~ x + I(x^2) + I(x^3), color = "yellow") +
  stat_smooth(color = "blue") + 
  labs(x = "Distance to closest public road in m (where closest house futher than 500 m away)", y = "Browsing pressure %")


ggplot(browseroad1500, aes(x = distroad1, y = browsingpressure)) +
    geom_point() +
    stat_smooth(method = "glm", color = "green") +
  stat_smooth(color = "blue")

ggplot(browseroad1500, aes(x = distroad1, y = browsingpressure)) +
    geom_point() +
    stat_smooth(method = "glm", formula = y ~ x + I(x^2), color = "red") +
  stat_smooth(color = "blue")

ggplot(browseroad1500, aes(x = distroad1, y = browsingpressure)) +
    geom_point() +
    stat_smooth(method = "glm", formula = y ~ x + I(x^2) + I(x^3), color = "yellow") +
  stat_smooth(color = "blue")
```

#### Birch/ other deciduous trees
```{r}
# 10th takst
ggplot(data = browse_sub, aes(distroad1, bbirch10)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth()+
            labs(x = "Distance to closest public road (m)", y = "Browsing pressure on birch %")+
            theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_sub, aes(distroad2, bbirch10, fill = distroad2)) +
            geom_smooth()+
            labs(x = "Distance to closest public and private roads (m)", y = "Browsing pressure on birch %")+
            theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_sub, aes(distroad3, bbirch10, fill = distroad3)) +
            geom_smooth()+
            labs(x = "Distance to closest public, private and forest roads (m)", y = "Browsing pressure on birch %")+
            theme_classic()

# 9th takst (here other deciduous)
ggplot(data = browse_sub, aes(distroad1, bdec9, fill = distroad1)) +
            geom_smooth()+
            labs(x = "Distance to closest public road (m)", y = "Browsing pressure on other decisuous trees %")+
            theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_sub, aes(distroad2, bdec9, fill = distroad2)) +
            geom_smooth()+
            labs(x = "Distance to closest public and private roads (m)", y = "Browsing pressure on other decisuous trees %")+
            theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_sub, aes(distroad3, bdec9, fill = distroad3)) +
            geom_smooth()+
            labs(x = "Distance to closest public, private and forest roads (m)", y = "Browsing pressure on other decisuous trees %")+
            theme_classic()

```

### Effect of road type on browsing pressure %

```{r}
# 10th takst
ggplot(data = browse_sub, aes(roadtype1, bros10, fill = roadtype1)) +
            geom_boxplot()+
            labs(x = "Road type (public roads)", y = "Browsing pressure on ROS %")+
            theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_sub, aes(roadtype1, bbirch10, fill = roadtype1)) +
            geom_boxplot()+
            labs(x = "Road type (public roads)", y = "Browsing pressure on birch %")+
            theme_classic()

ggplot(data = browse_sub, aes(roadtype1, bpine10, fill = roadtype1)) +
            geom_boxplot()+
            labs(x = "Road type (public roads)", y = "Browsing pressure on pine %")+
            theme_classic()

```
